backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing contact messages, user profiles, and admin authorization using AccessControl with upgrade-safe admin persistence.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing gradient‑text fixes in HeroSection and related files with associated components and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of key frontend React components, hooks, sections, and Tailwind config files.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS variables and theming for light/dark modes with OKLCH color tokens and global background/foreground styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point configuring metadata, cache‑busting headers, fonts, and mounting the React root.
frontend/scripts/generateCaffeineAdminTo: Node script generating a secure admin token for provisioning Messages page admin access via URL hash.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app routing between homepage sections and the Messages page with gradient background layers and shared navbar/footer.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer with themed styling and caffeine.ai attribution.
Responsive navbar handling section scroll navigation, Messages routing, and Internet Identity login/logout state.
frontend/src/components/SectionLayout.ts: Reusable section wrapper that renders optional titles/subtitles and children with layout classes.
frontend/src/config/adminToken.ts: Returns the admin token from env or a fallback hardcoded value for development.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity and initializes access control via secret token.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithAdminProv: Creates a backend actor and attempts admin authorization using a session token, reloading when the token changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminStatus.ts: Queries backend to check if the current caller is recognized as an admin.
frontend/src/hooks/useContactSubmit.ts: Submits contact form messages through the actor with basic error normalization.
frontend/src/hooks/useCountUpOnView.ts: Animates counting up to a target value when the element becomes visible using IntersectionObserver.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, loading/storing identities and exposing login/logout state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Fetches contact messages from the backend when enabled and allowed by admin status.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base and custom theme variables for light/dark modes with gradient and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/MessagesPage.tsx: Admin messages UI handling login, admin provisioning, remediation, and message fetching logic.
frontend/src/sections/AboutSection.tsx: Renders an About section with professional summary, education history, and career vision using cards and styled layout.
frontend/src/sections/CertificationsSect: Displays a single certification card within a styled section layout.
frontend/src/sections/ContactSection.tsx: Implements a contact form with validation, submission handling, error toasts, and contact detail links.
Shows a timeline-style experience section with roles, dates, and achievements in card format.
frontend/src/sections/HeroSection.tsx: Builds a hero section with metrics, skills, background graphics, and resume download support.
frontend/src/sections/ProjectsSection.ts: Presents featured projects with descriptions, highlights, tools, and icons in a grid layout.
frontend/src/sections/SkillsSection.tsx: Lists categorized technical skills using cards and badges within a structured section layout.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routes), store them in sessionStorage, retrieve them, and remove them from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, custom colors, animations, fonts, and included plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, issues, and feature fixes related to invisible gradient text in the Hero section.
